Caption: Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) seated in a car with other dignitaries (possibly towards the end of his visit to IIT Madras)
Description: On 30th January, 1964 Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. The Minister spent the evening conversing with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members who were present and the entire event was nothing short of an elegant and formal affair. In the image, Mr. Hans Lenz prepares to leave (probably) after attending the high tea ceremony. Also seen standing in the image from the left: Prof. B. Sengupto, an individual who is yet to be identified, Prof. R. G. Narayanmurthy (HOD, Mechanical Engineering), Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy (Superintending Engineer) and Dr. Nikolaus Klein (Professor of German)
